title: Invitational Gallery
content:
The Invitational Gallery, a Mayfest tradition, will showcase the artwork of over 100 professional Tulsa area artists in the Williams Towers Lobby. Gallery hours will be: 11am-6pm Thursday, May 19th - Saturday, May 21st and 11am-3pm on Sunday, May 22nd. There will be an opening for the Invitational Gallery on Wednesday, May 18th, 6pm – 8pm. Tickets are $25 and can be purchased by calling 918.582.6435 in advance or at the door the evening of the opening. Drinks and hors d’oeuvres are included in the price of the tickets. Original artwork for the 2011 Mayfest poster art will be auctioned and all artwork will be available for sale the evening of the opening. Don’t miss a chance to get a sneak preview of the gallery and the opportunity to purchase a piece of original art while supporting the Tulsa art community. 2011 Invitational Gallery Awards Winners:
  • 1st Place - Denise Rinkovsky, For Slo Drag #4
  • 2nd Place - Sarah Sartain, Cardinal
  • Tie for 3rd Place - Cameron Clement, DomEnation; John Owen, Aunt Mildred and Uncle Charlie Catch a Few Winks on the Ferry
Congratulatioss to the following Tulsa area artists. They have been selected to showcase their work in the 2011 Mayfest Invitational Gallery. Gil Adams Lisa Adams Kristy Lewis Andrew Marjorie Atwood Margaret Aycock Doug Bauer Shane Bevel Sam & Paul Bevilacqua Ralph Blankenship Cynthia Brown Rebecca Bryant Phillip Butler Tanya Butler Kevin Byrne Nancy Smart Carlson Eleanor Davy Carmack Cameron Clement Larry Clingman Neil Cluck Steve Cluck Jim Coles Tom Conrad Rosalind Cook Bryan Cooper Phillip Cooper Melvin Cornshucker Linda Coward Dolores Creekmore Michele Cruncleton Kathleen Curran Aleatha Bailey Currie Betty Dalsing Kay Deardorff William Derrevere Kim Doner Elizabeth Downing Claudia Doyle Jane Lyon Duenner Jody Ellison Don Emrick Alan Frakes Joey Frisillo Darlene Garmaker Clyde Glandon Patricia Glasco Marillyn Golla-Gass Shan Goshorn Karen Greenawalt Gary Hale David Halpern Nancy Hamill Susan Hammond Nancy Harkins Ruth E.
